alert.note: Alert for Durham; Granville; Orange; Person; Vance; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Person, northern Vance, northwestern Warren, northeastern Orange, Granville and northwestern Durham Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 800 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rougemont, or 9 miles northeast of Hillsborough, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Roxboro, Butner, Rougemont, Concord, Stem, Stovall, Lake Michie, Eno River State Park and Mayo Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Durham; Granville; Orange; Person; Vance; Warren
